channel.title: openstack on Panda的随笔
channel.description: Recent content in openstack on Panda的随笔

item.title: 添加openstack源
item.description: 添加OpenStack Mitaka源 1 2 3 sudo apt-get install ubuntu-cloud-keyring sudo add-apt-repository cloud-archive:mitaka 相同方法，可以添加其它版本，如kilo 1 2 3 sudo add-apt-repository clound-archive:kilo sudo apt-get update
